changeSet.author: CWDS TPT-3 Team
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "CL_ADDRT" ( "IDENTIFIER" CHAR(10) NOT NULL , "ADDR_TPC" SMALLINT NOT NULL , "BK_INMT_ID" CHAR(10) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT , "EFF_END_DT" DATE WITH DEFAULT NULL , "EFF_STRTDT" DATE WITH DEFAULT NULL , "LST_UPD_ID" CHAR(3) NOT NULL , "LST_UPD_TS" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , "FKADDRS_T" CHAR(10) NOT NULL , "FKCLIENT_T" CHAR(10) NOT NULL , "HOMLES_IND" CHAR(1) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT 'N' , "FKREFERL_T" CHAR(10) WITH DEFAULT NULL );
